title: Executive Function Theft
dot:
digraph EFT{node[shape=box, style=filled, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12, width=2.5];edge[fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];EFT[label="Executive Function Theft (EFT)", shape=ellipse, style=filled, fillcolor="#fddfdf"];TheftCause[label="Deliberate Abdication of Decision-Making
(Administrative, Repetitive, Unpleasant Tasks)", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];Outcome[label="Recipient's Executive Function Exhaustion
Inability to Contribute to Higher Efforts", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"]; CorporateEFT[label="Corporate EFT: Health Benefits & Reimbursement", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];AdministrativeTasks[label="Administrative Tasks: Billing, Reimbursement, Paperwork", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];CorporateInefficiency[label="Corporate Goal: Make Tasks Inconvenient & Difficult", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];WorkplaceEFT[label="Workplace EFT: Inequality of Service Labor", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];ServiceLabor[label="Service Labor: Note-Taking, Scheduling, Committee Appointments", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];GenderBias[label="Gendered Component of Service Work", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];NonPromotableTasks[label="Non-Promotable Work
(‘Shallow Work’, Administrative Work)", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];HomeEFT[label="Home EFT: Decision Fatigue in Relationships", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];CaregivingTasks[label="Caregiving: Household Chores, Meal Planning, Holidays", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];Imbalance[label="Imbalance: One Partner Overburdened, Other Free to Relax or Plan", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];MentalLoad[label="Mental Load: Emotional & Invisible Labor", shape=box, fillcolor="#f0f0f0"];ReduceEFT[label="Reducing EFT: Raising Awareness, Changing Behavior", shape=box, fillcolor="#e5f7df"];Awareness[label="Increased Awareness of Harmful Behavior", shape=box, fillcolor="#e5f7df"];Consent[label="Consent & Shared Responsibility in Relationships", shape=box, fillcolor="#e5f7df"];EFT->TheftCause;EFT->Outcome;EFT->CorporateEFT;CorporateEFT->AdministrativeTasks;CorporateEFT->CorporateInefficiency;EFT->WorkplaceEFT;WorkplaceEFT->ServiceLabor;WorkplaceEFT->GenderBias;WorkplaceEFT->NonPromotableTasks;EFT->HomeEFT;HomeEFT->CaregivingTasks;HomeEFT->Imbalance;HomeEFT->MentalLoad;EFT->ReduceEFT;ReduceEFT->Awareness;ReduceEFT->Consent;}
